Articles.Content:
Hey, so I was wondering, is there any way to get oxidizer? I am planning on building an interplanetary ship that can go between planets, have something land, collect fuel, take off, dock, and make fuel. I have not played around much with fuel collection. Any ways to do this?

Edited September 30, 2019 by OrbiterAirFields

Making oxidizer isn't any different than making Liquid Fuel.

The convert-o-trons have several options.  Making Liquid Fuel (LqdFuel), Oxidizer (Ox), Liquid Fuel and Oxidizer (Lf + Ox), or Monopropellant (Monoprop)

Most of the time you're just going to use the Lf + Ox option, since it will produce them at the same time in the ratio you need.
